beamsplitter_manufacturer.definition: The Manufacturer providing the beam splitter.

beamsplitter_wavelength.definition: The wavelength at which the beam splitter separates the beams.

definition: The FilterSet or also FilterCube used in a microscope.

description.definition: A description of this hardware item.

emission_filter_lower_bound.definition: The lower bound of of the wavelength transmitted by the emission filter.

emission_filter_manufacturer.definition: The Manufacturer providing the  of the excitation filter.

emission_filter_passband_transmission.definition: The transmission in the passband. Given in %.

emission_filter_range.definition: The width of the transmitted wavelength range.

emission_filter_upper_bound.definition: The upper bound of of the wavelength transmitted by the excitation filter.

emission_filter_wavelength.definition: The wavelength of the excitation filter.

excitation_filter_lower_bound.definition: The lower bound of of the wavelength transmitted by the excitation filter.

excitation_filter_manufacturer.definition: The Manufacturer providing the  of the excitation filter.

excitation_filter_passband_transmission.definition: The transmission in the passband. Given in %.

excitation_filter_range.definition: The width of the transmitted wavelength range.

excitation_filter_upper_bound.definition: The upper bound of of the wavelength transmitted by the excitation filter.

excitation_filter_wavelength.definition: The wavelength of the excitation filter.

inventory_no.definition: The inventory number of the FilterSet.

owner.definition: The inventory number of the FilterSet.
